about_the_game:
In the 'The Scorchfarer Artbook', you will be able to find all of the assets that were used during the creation of the first episode: The Wanderer and the Anchor. Character sketches, background creation process and concept art from the early days of development can be found in this artbook. It also includes development commentary of how the world of 'The Scorchfarer' came to be.

Purchasing this artbook support us directly, and helps us continue working on The Scorchfarer.

How to access the artbook once purchased

The artbook will be located in the game files once downloaded in a folder called 'Artbook'. Go to your Steam installation folder and follow this path to get there manually, "\steamapps\common\The Scorchfarer\Artbook".


You can also access this folder by going to your Steam library and going to the properties of the base game, "Properties..." by right-clicking the game. Once there, navigate to the "LOCAL FILES" tab and click on "Browse...", then navigate to the 'Artbook' folder.

content_descriptors.notes: Some of the art features blood and gore
